attributes.action: ensure equal treatment of part time and full time students.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Part time students currently have a terrible deal. 
The usual reason for studying part- time is because the student cannot afford to study full time and so are forced to work and study at the same time. Again and again the benefits(such as income tax relief and council tax relief etc etc) are not given to part-time students. This has got to stop. This is another example of the government supporting the rich! Treat all students fairly whether part-time or full-time! Don't tax
